item.description:
http://www.noreastere...

There is a huge EMS Nor'Easter Festival running from Friday, September 24th through Sunday, September 26th up in New Hampshire that looks incredibly fun. Tickets to the Festival include: 2 nights of camping; 3 days of live music, climbing competitions, mountain biking, camping, and partying.

Check it out @: http://www.noreastere...

The cost of the event is listed as $75.00- but if we can organize groups of 5 people per car- each person will only pay $50.00- Organizers will purchase tickets in bulk on Fri., Sept. 10th, so please let Nate or Steph know as soon as you can if you're interested!

For more information, emails: natemckenzie@gmail.com; sdambrose@gmail.com or ask any questions you think of while your @ the gym.

Everyone who's interested- let's meet @ the gym on Wed., Sept. 8th @ 7:00 p.m. to plan rides & sharing camping gear & food (only if you like). You can pay on the 8th- or else come- hear more about the event & let us know by Friday if you're in!
item.name: EMS's Nor'Easter Festival
